name: pico.url
description: pico.url is a fast, secure, and privacy-focused URL shortening service that transforms long web links into simple, memorable, and shareable short URLs. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), pico.url offers seamless offline support, instant loading, and easy access from any device.
